meanings.sent1: There were numerous stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with numerous trees.
meanings.sent3: The party had numerous balloons, making it a colorful event.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a canvas of numerous buildings reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The field was covered with numerous flowers, creating a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: Consisting of a large number; abundant.
meanings.sent1: She had numerous books on her shelf.
meanings.sent2: The market was bustling with numerous shoppers.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with numerous candles, ready to be blown out.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a paradise of numerous plants and flowers.
meanings.sent5: The exam had numerous questions, testing the students' knowledge.
